All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractCrudService<R,T,ID>
Generic abstract service that delegate CRUD operations to a repository (composition style).
ActionButtonTableCell<R>
A TableCell that renders a single action Button.
ActionColumnFactory
Wires a TableColumn so that each row renders an action button.
AlertHelper
Helper for showing JavaFX alert dialogs.
BaseEntity
Abstract JPA base class that hold a Long id and try to be proxy-safe for equals/hashCode (it use Hibernate.getClass(Object) for checks).
CategoriesController
JavaFX controller for the categories view.
Category
Very simple category entity with a normalized unique name.
CategoryComboBinder
Binds a ComboBox of Category to a data loader.
CategoryCreate
Tiny DTO for create or rename a category.
CategoryFields
Field keys for the Category entity as a top-level enum.
CategoryRepository
 
CategoryRow
UI friendly row for categories.
CategoryServiceImpl
Final service implementation for work with Category entities.
CrudRepository<T,ID>
Very small generic persistence port.
Deadline
Deadline/bill entity representing a single due item.
DeadlineCreate
A compact DTO used to create a deadline (like a bill or some charge to pay).
DeadlineRepository
Repository for Deadline entities backed by Hibernate.
DeadlineRow
UI friendly row for the deadlines table.
DeadlinesController
JavaFX controller for the deadlines view.
DeadlineServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing Deadline entities and producing DeadlineRows.
FilterMode
Filter modes for compare a date against “today”.
FormHelper
Default form helper for TextField inputs parsing Double amounts.
HibernateRepository<T,ID>
Base Hibernate-backed repository with simple CRUD helpers and transaction handling.
HibernateUtil
Utility that bootstraps Hibernate and give a single SessionFactory for the whole app.
IActionColumnFactory
Abstraction for wiring a TableColumn so each row displays an action button.
IAddableView
Contract for views that support adding/creating a new item.
IAlertHelper<M>
Abstraction for showing JavaFX alert dialogs.
ICategoriesView
View contract for the Categories screen.
ICategoryComboBinder<T>
Abstraction for binding a ComboBox of items to a data source.
ICategoryService
Service contract for work with Category entities.
ICrudService<T,ID>
Minimal CRUD service, like really tiny.
IDeadlineService
Service contract for deadlines.
IDeadlinesView
View contract for the Deadlines screen.
Identifiable<ID>
Object that expose a technical identifier.
IFormHelper<T,N>
Utilities for reading and validating form inputs.
IMovementRowMapper<E,R>
Maps a domain entity to a view-model row.
ISeriesBuilder<C,T>
Builds a JavaFX XYChart.Series to visualize a category trend.
IStatisticsView
View contract for the Statistics screen.
ISummaryCalculator<T>
Calculates aggregated totals for a set of transactions: total income, total expense, and net.
ITransactionService
Service contract for working with Transaction aggregates.
ITransactionsRefresher<R>
Loads rows for the transactions table according to a filter.
ITransactionsTableBinder<R>
Binds table columns to row properties for the transactions table.
ITransactionsView
View contract for the Transactions screen.
IView
Base contract for application views/controllers.
MainApp
Main JavaFX application entry point.
MovementRow
UI friendly row for the movements / transactions table (no tags version).
MovementRowMapper
Maps a Transaction to a display-ready MovementRow.
Named
Objects that expose a human readable name.
SeriesBuilder
Builds a cumulative net-balance series for a category.
ServiceFactory
Static factory that provides lazily initialized service singletons.
StatisticsController
JavaFX controller for the statistics view.
SummaryCalculator
Computes summary totals over a list of transactions: total income, total expense (as a positive magnitude), and net.
Transaction
Financial transaction entity that represent an income or an expense.
TransactionCreate
Tiny DTO to create a transaction (no tags version).
TransactionFields
Field keys for the Transaction entity as a top-level enum.
TransactionRepository
Repository for Transaction entities backed by Hibernate.
TransactionsController
Controller for the Transactions view.
TransactionServiceImpl
Transaction service (no Tag handling here).
TransactionsRefresher
Loads transactions from the service and maps them to MovementRows.
TransactionsTableBinder
Binds transactions table columns to MovementRow properties.
TransactionType
Kind of financial transaction — basically the direction where money go.
TxFilter
Tiny value object that group optional query criterias for transactions.
TxPredicateBuilder
Builds Predicates for filtering Transaction queries.
